level.heading: Resignation by members of the uniformed force of the department of correction.
level.text: ยง 9-113 Resignation by members of the uniformed force of the department of correction. Absence, without leave and without an explanation, of any member of the force for five consecutive work days shall be deemed and held to be a resignation, and the member so absent shall, at the expiration of such period, cease to be a member of the force and be dismissed therefrom.
